# R Markdown

This is testing creating a new post and plotly


```{r cars}
p <- ggplot(gapminder, aes(gdpPercap, lifeExp, color = continent)) +
          geom_point(aes(size = pop, frame = year, ids = country)) +
            scale_x_log10()+
            facet_wrap(~continent)
        
        
        fig <- ggplotly(p)
        fig <- fig %>% 
             animation_opts(
            1000, redraw = FALSE)
fig
```
